oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Horace "Buddy" Mitchell interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mitchell, Horace; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mitchell, Horace; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Horace "Buddy" Mitchell served in Vietnam from June 1969 to June 1970 in the 1st Air Cavalry. The interview was conducted by Ed Caudill.
